title: Simple Condensed Bitmap Font
content:
Just put together a simple bitmap font. Is there something similar to this already out?   
   
I need something about this size to work with frutiger condensed. Let me know what you all think. I'm still not familiar with any of the font building programs...so any tips would help.   
   
Thanks!   
 ![bitmap.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414161654im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1860.gif)
author: rburke

comments.content:
Similar to one of mine:   
   
 [http://www.selfbuildtype.com/html/expo.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414161654/http:/www.selfbuildtype.com/html/expo.htm)   
   
as for tips - just keep testing and tweaking.
